remarks: Lemma for ~ isosctr .  Corresponds to the case where one vertex is at 0, another at 1 and the third lies on the unit circle.  (Contributed by Saveliy Skresanov, 31-Dec-2016.)
statement: isosctrlem2 $p |- ( ( A e. CC /\ ( abs ` A ) = 1 /\ -. 1 = A ) -> ( Im ` ( log ` ( 1 - A ) ) ) = ( Im ` ( log ` ( -u A / ( 1 - A ) ) ) ) ) $.
